statements: SELECT * FROM documentation;
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM documentation ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE team_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT document_title FROM documentation WHERE document_id = '987e6543-12d3-a456-4266-1474000123';
SELECT document_title, team_id FROM documentation ORDER BY team_id ASC, document_title DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_title, document_content FROM documentation;
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE team_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4fed';
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM documentation WHERE team_id = '27ab6e56-20c4-49a7-aeed-c462e823d507' ORDER BY document_title DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT team_id FROM documentation;
SELECT document_id, UPPER(document_title) AS uppercase_title FROM documentation WHERE LENGTH(document_content) > 100;
SELECT * FROM documentation_table;
SELECT title, author, created_at FROM documentation_table ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT content FROM documentation_table WHERE author='John Smith';
SELECT name, role, location FROM team_members_table WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM documentation_table LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM documentation_table ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT doc_id, title, author FROM documentation_table WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, content FROM documentation_table WHERE content LIKE '%example%';
SELECT title, author, created_at FROM documentation_table WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT name, role, location FROM team_members_table WHERE role = 'Developer' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM documentation;
SELECT title, author, created_at FROM documentation WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT content FROM documentation WHERE doc_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT doc_id, tag_id FROM doc_tags WHERE doc_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM documentation ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM documentation WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT doc_id, title, content, author, created_at FROM documentation WHERE author='Jane Smith' AND created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT d.title, t.tag_name FROM documentation d JOIN doc_tags dt ON d.doc_id = dt.doc_id JOIN tags t ON t.tag_id = dt.tag_id;
SELECT d.title, d.author, t.tag_name FROM documentation d LEFT JOIN doc_tags dt ON d.doc_id = dt.doc_id LEFT JOIN tags t ON t.tag_id = dt.tag_id WHERE t.tag_name = 'SQL';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base;
SELECT title, content FROM knowledge_base WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, created_at FROM knowledge_base ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM teams ORDER BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM knowledge_base ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead_id FROM teams WHERE team_lead_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, email, role FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT document_id, tag_name FROM document_tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 'important%';
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT title, created_at FROM documents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT doc_id, title, content FROM documents WHERE doc_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT doc_id, tag_name FROM document_tags JOIN tags ON document_tags.tag_id = tags.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE doc_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE title LIKE '%analysis%';
SELECT doc_id, title, created_at FROM documents WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT d.title, c.category_name FROM documents d JOIN document_categories dc ON d.doc_id = dc.doc_id JOIN categories c ON dc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT d.title, t.tag_name FROM documents d JOIN document_tags dt ON d.doc_id = dt.doc_id JOIN tags t ON dt.tag_id = t.tag_id ORDER BY d.title ASC, t.tag_name ASC;
